get.summary: Lists job runs, optionally filtered, sorted, and paginated.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project containing the job.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of the job containing the job runs.

parameters.name: search_filter
parameters.description:
Search filter is an optional HTTP parameter to filter results by.
Supported search filter keys are: [creator.email creator.name creator.username description kernel name paused script type],
where "status" can be one of the following: [scheduling, running, stopping, stopped, succeeded, failed, timedout]
For example:
  search_filter={"status":"running","id": "1"}.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort is an optional HTTP parameter to sort results by.
Supported sort keys are: [created_at creator.email creator.name creator.username description kernel name paused script type updated_at]"
where "+" means sort by ascending order, and "-" means sort by descending order.
For example:
  sort=-updated_at,+name.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
Page size is an optional argument for number of entries to return in one page.
If not specified, the server will determine a page size.
If specified, must be respecified for further requests when using the
provided next page token in the response.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description:
Page token is an optional argument for specifying which page of results to get.
If not specified, the first page will be returned, including a token for the next page.
Will be empty if there is no next page.

post.summary: Create and start a new job run for a job.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project containing the job.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: The job ID to create a new job run for.

project_id.description: ID of the project containing the job.

job_id.description: The job ID to create a new job run for.

environment.description: The environment variables to include in this run.

arguments.title: The arguments to pass to this job run

schema.description: Parameters to create a new job run.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project containing the job.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of the job containing the job run.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: ID of the job run to get.

post.summary: Stops a job run. Encoded as a custom method.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project containing the job

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of the job containing the job run.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: ID of the job run to delete.
